Built-in Declarations
===================================================================================================

Declarations make up the backbone of how Biohazrd translates your C/C++ code, but they also represent your interop library in an abstract manner.

Below is a list of the various declaration types built in to Biohazrd. Entries marked as ğŸš§ are still a work-in-progress.

* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedBaseField`](TranslatedBaseField.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedBitField`](TranslatedBitField.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedDeclaration`](TranslatedDeclaration.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedEnum`](TranslatedEnum.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedEnumConstant`](TranslatedEnumConstant.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedField`](TranslatedField.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedFunction`](TranslatedFunction.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedNormalField`](TranslatedNormalField.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedParameter`](TranslatedParameter.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedRecord`](TranslatedRecord.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedStaticField`](TranslatedStaticField.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedTypedef`](TranslatedTypedef.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedUndefinedRecord`](TranslatedUndefinedRecord.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedUnimplementedField`](TranslatedUnimplementedField.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedUnsupportedDeclaration`](TranslatedUnsupportedDeclaration.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedVTable`](TranslatedVTable.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedVTableEntry`](TranslatedVTableEntry.md)
* ğŸš§ [`TranslatedVTableField`](TranslatedVTableField.md)
* **C#-specific**
* ğŸš§ [`ConstantArrayTypeDeclaration`](ConstantArrayTypeDeclaration.md)
* [`NativeBooleanDeclaration`](NativeBooleanDeclaration.md)
* [`NativeCharDeclaration`](NativeCharDeclaration.md)
* ğŸš§ [`SynthesizedLooseDeclarationsTypeDeclaration`](SynthesizedLooseDeclarationsTypeDeclaration.md)
